57-year-old.context: In summary, this 57-year-old man presented with T1 N3 cancer of the nasopharynx and is now at 20 months post completion of all therapy.

upper respiratory infection.context: He did have an episode of upper respiratory infection and fever at the end of April which got better with antibiotics.

Extraocular muscles intact.context: HEENT: Extraocular muscles intact. Sclerae not icteric. Oral cavity free of exudate or ulceration. Dry mouth noted.

Awake, alert, ambulatory, oriented, cogn.context: Neurologic: Awake, alert, ambulatory, oriented, cognitively intact.

no evidence of metabolically active mali.context: I reviewed the CT images and report of the study done on May 1. This showed no evidence of metabolically active malignancy.

TSH was normal.context: Most recent laboratory studies were performed last September and the TSH was normal. I have asked him to repeat the TSH at the one year anniversary.

no current medications.context: He is on no current medications.

PET-CT.context: We will see him in six months' time with a PET-CT.

CBC.context: I have asked him to obtain a TSH at the one year anniversary in September and CBC in follow up.
